name: Lamplight Lounge
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Pixar Pier

items.title: Breakfast Barbacoa Tamales*
items.description: With Black Bean Purée, Pumpkin Mole, Creamy Salsa Verde, Pickled Onions, Queso Fresco and Two Eggs-Up

items.title: Smoked Salmon Egg White Omelet
items.description: With Dill Cream Cheese, Avocado and Crispy Capers, served with Green Goddess Baby Gem Salad, and Cheesy Potatoes

items.title: Brunch Burger*
items.description: Grilled Custom Burger Blend with American Cheese, One Egg-up, Hash Brown Patty, Roasted Green Chile, Lettuce, Caramelized Onions and Paprika Aïoli on a toasted Amish Bun with Fresh Fruit

items.title: Lamplight French Toast
items.description: Chai Tea Custard, Caramelized Peaches, Orange Bourbon Honey Glaze, Candied Pecans and Chai Tea Whipped Cream

items.title: Lamplight Chilaquiles*
items.description: House-made Tortilla Chips tossed in a 3-Chile Red Sauce, Cheddar-Jack, Two Eggs-up, Queso Fresco, Red Onions, Cilantro-Serrano Sour Cream and Sliced Avocado, topped with Pepitas

items.title: Steak and Eggs*
items.description: New York Steak, Two Eggs-up, Piquillo Butter Sauce, Arugula Salad and Pickled Onions with Cheesy Potatoes

items.title: Potato Flautas
items.description: Chorizo, Piquillo Crema, Tomatillo-Serrano Salsa, Arugula and Escabèche Salad

items.title: Omelet
items.description: Egg Whites and Cheddar Jack, served with "fish" Crackers with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit, or Potatoes.

items.title: Indulgent French Toast
items.description: Cinnamon-Brown Sugar Challah Bread, Whipped Cream, Syrup, Bacon with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit, or Potatoes.

items.title: Mini Brunch Burger
items.description: Mini Brunch Burger 2 oz. Chuck Patty, American Cheese, Bacon and Egg on a Toasted Amish Bun with choice of two selections: Vanilla Yogurt, Fresh Fruit, or Potatoes.

items.title: Donuts
items.description: Ask about our seasonal offering.

items.title: Goofball Island
items.description: Simply Fruit Punch®, Minute Maid® Lemonade and Raspberry Purée

items.title: Falling with Style
items.description: Minute Maid® Lemonade with Mango Purée

items.title: Mint to Be
items.description: Simply Limeade®, Watermelon and Berry Purée and fresh Mint topped with Soda Water
a frozen Mocktail made with Strawberry Purée, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple Juice topped with Coca-Cola®

items.title: Pixar Ball Sipper
items.description: Available to purchase with any Non-Alcoholic beverage purchase

items.title: Assorted Beverages
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Sprite®, Fanta® Orange, Minute Maid® Light Lemonade, Barq's® Root Beer and freshly brewed Iced Tea

items.title: Assorted Twinings of London® Hot Teas
Mimosa Flight
items.description: Seasonal flavors

items.title: Beer Mimosa
items.description: Blood Orange Beer topped with Fresh Orange Juice

items.title: Cinnamon Toast Cocktail
items.description: Stoli Vanilla Vodka, Frangelico, Rumchata and Cinnamon Cereal-infused Milk

items.title: Java Martini
items.description: Tequila, Coffee Liqueur, Licor 43 and Hazelnut Cream Cold Foam

items.title: Tamarind Cucumber Cocktail
items.description: Tequila, Cucumber, Tamarind, and Lime Juice

items.title: Huckleberry Dragon Fruit Lemonade
items.description: Huckleberry Vodka, Dragon Fruit Syrup, Lemon Juice and Agave

items.title: Water District Gimlet
items.description: Empress Gin, 1883 Lychee Syrup and Lime Juice

items.title: Over Budget
items.description: Grey Goose Vodka, Liquid Alchemist Passion Fruit, fresh Lime Juice, Agave Nectar and Ginger Beer

items.title: Scream Canister
items.description: Bacardi Superior Rum, Cream of Coconut and Pineapple and Orange Juices with a mist of Angostura Bitters

items.title: Find Your Spark
items.description: X-Fusion Vodka, Bacardi Raspberry Rum, Lemon Juice, Watermelon Syrup and Sparkling Wine

items.title: Sunrise Spectacular
items.description: Maker's Mark Bourbon, Tropical Juices, Agave Nectar and a dash of Angostura Bitters

items.title: Cobra Hiss
items.description: Del Maguey Vida Mezcal, Cointreau, Cucumber Syrup, Lemon Juice and Agave Nectar

items.title: Berry Smash
items.description: Rye Whiskey, Blueberry Syrup, Mint, Lemon Juice, Passion Fruit Syrup and Blueberries

items.title: Final with a Fix
items.description: Greenbar IXÁ Reposado Tequila, Raspberry Liqueur, Cointreau, fresh Lime Juice, Agave Nectar and a spritz of Del Maguey Vida Mezcal

items.title: Open Ocean with a Splash
items.description: a Frozen Cocktail made with Bacardi Raspberry Rum, Bols Blue Curaçao, Liquid Alchemist Orgeat (Almond), Agave Nectar and fresh Lime Juice

items.title: Red is a Lucky Color
items.description: X-Fusion Vodka, Bacardi Superior Rum, Strawberry and Raspberry Purées and Rosemary Syrup

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Breakfast Barbacoa Tamales*
items.description: Black Bean Purée, Pumpkin Mole, Creamy Salsa Verde, Pickled Onions, Queso Fresco and two Eggs-up (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Smoked Salmon Egg White Omelet
items.description: Dill Cream Cheese, Avocado and Crispy Capers, served with Green Goddess Baby Gem Salad, and Cheesy Potatoes (For Peanut/Tree Nut, Shellfish and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Lamplight French Toast
items.description: Chai Tea Custard, Caramelized Peaches, Orange Bourbon Honey Glaze, Candied Pecans and Chai Tea Whipped Cream (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Brunch Burger*
items.description: Grilled Custom Burger Blend with American Cheese, One Egg-up, Hash Brown Patty, Roasted Green Chile, Lettuce, Caramelized Onions and Paprika Aïoli on a toasted Amish Bun with Fresh Fruit. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Lamplight Chilaquiles*
items.description: House-made Tortilla Chips tossed in a 3-Chile Red Sauce, Cheddar-Jack, two Eggs-up, Queso Fresco, Cilantro-Serrano Crema and sliced Avocado, topped with Pepitas. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut and Sesame Allergies)

items.title: Steak and Eggs*
items.description: New York Steak, two Eggs-up, Piquillo Butter Sauce, Arugula Salad and Pickled Onions with Cheesy Potatoes (For Gluten/Wheat, Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Potato Flautas
items.description: Plant-based Chorizo, Dairy-free Piquillo Crema, Tomatillo-Serrano Salsa, Arugula and Escabèche Salad. (For Gluten/Wheat, Egg, Fish/Shellfish, Milk and Peanut/Tree Nut Allergies)

items.title: Guests must speak to a Cast Member about their allergy-friendly request
Indulgent French Toast
items.description: Cinnamon-Brown Sugar Challah Bread, Whipped Cream, Syrup, Bacon and Fresh Fruit. (For Fish/Shellfish, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Soy Allergies)

items.title: Mini Brunch Burger
items.description: 2 oz. Chuck Patty, American Cheese, Bacon and Egg on a Toasted Amish Bun with Fresh Fruit. (For Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Shellfish Allergies)

items.title: Potato Skins
items.description: crispy Yukon Gold Potatoes with Brown Butter-Caper Yogurt, Smoked Paprika Aïoli and Manchego Cheese

items.title: Barbacoa Tamales
items.description: With Pumpkin Mole, Pickled Onions, Crema, Queso Fresco and Toasted Pumpkin Seeds

items.title: Grilled Head-on Prawns*
items.description: with Farro Corn Risotto, Green Garlic Emulsion and Seasonal Vegetables

items.description: Citrus Marinade, Soy-glazed Potatoes & Pearl Onions and Blistered Mini Sweet Peppers with Aji Sauce

items.title: Tuna Tataki Salad*
items.description: Furikake-crusted Seared Tuna, Mixed Greens, Edamame, Cucumber, Orange Segments, Avocado Wasabi Spread, Fried Lotus Root and Orange Vinaigrette

items.description: Lettuce, House Pickles, Tomato, Grilled Onions and Lamplight Spread on a Sesame Bun, served with Seasoned Fries

items.title: Vietnamese BBQ Pork Chop
items.description: with Spicy Garlic Noodles and Chile-marinated Cucumbers

items.title: Brussels Caesar
items.description: House-made Dressing, Toasted Pine Nuts and Garlic Croutons with Roasted Red Pepper and Tomato Sauce.

items.title: Impossible™ Burger
items.description: Two Seasoned Impossible™ Patties, American Cheese, House Spread, Grilled Onions, Lettuce, and Tomato on a Potato Bun served with Seasoned Fries

items.description: with Vanilla Bean Ice Cream, Berry Sauce and Berries

items.description: Lettuce, House Pickles, Tomato, Grilled Onions and Lamplight Spread on a Sesame Bun, served with Seasoned Fries (For Fish/Shellfish and Peanut/Tree Nut Allergies, Gluten-Friendly Bun available upon request)

Chicken
items.description: Grilled Tenders with Orange Sauce served with Carrots, Yogurt & Berries with a choice of small DASANI® water or small lowfat milk (For Egg, Fish, Milk, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Shellfish Allergies)

items.title: Burger Slider
items.description: Mini Burger with Cheese and Pickles on a Toasted Bun served with Carrots, Yogurt & Berries with a choice of small DASANI® water or small lowfat milk. (For Egg, Fish, Peanut/Tree Nut, Sesame and Shellfish Allergies)
